gstat.premade.blackjack

Class BlackJackHand

  • java.lang.Object
    • gstat.util.Hand<StandardPlayingCard>
      • gstat.premade.blackjack.BlackJackHand

  • public class BlackJackHand
extends Hand<StandardPlayingCard>
    Creates methods helpful for Blackjack. Extends Hand class and adds the Blackjack methods to that.
    Author:
    Alex Berns

      • findHandValue

        public int findHandValue()
        Calculates the value of the Hand. Soft hands (Aces = 11) are automatically dealt with.
        Returns:
        Value of Hand

      • canSplit

        public java.lang.Boolean canSplit()
        Determines if the Hand can be split. Checks for two cards of same suit.
        Returns:
        If Hand can be split
